name: Rescue Center (GracieGee)
description:
150 years ago, a catastrophe swept across the Earth, wiping out 95% of human civilization and plunging humanity into crisis when unknown creatures invaded the Earth. 

After 150 years, mankind fell and was forced to thrive in a carefully constructed rescue center built by unknown creatures. Looking back at the glorious time of human civilization, many people have begun to yearn for the freedom they once had, and the Earth's environment has been restored to a condition suitable for human survival. 

The language barrier and years of living in rescue centers have prevented humans from taking the initiative to rebuild their homes. Unknown creatures may be benevolent and are doing what they can to save the human species, but the price human have to pay is the loss of freedom.
